item.title: Deauth-Attack not working
item.description: One reason might be that the network you are trying to attack is safe against it.The deauther is at its core a pentesting device and as such usues an exploit in the way WiFi works wich may or may not have been fixed. Maybe try the device on a different network.  I have a question  Suggest changes  Source
